chunks.summary: Hyper-V is Microsoft's virtualization software that enables users to run multiple operating systems simultaneously on a single physical machine through virtual machines (VMs). This technology allows for efficient resource management, testing of different environments, and enhanced security by isolating applications. Practical applications include server consolidation, development and testing environments, and disaster recovery solutions.
